name: Dark Maze 2
description: Get the feeling of enclosed space... Pass hundreds of kilometers to get out of hell... Be careful, because you don't know who is standing around the corner...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 2048 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2100 MB available space
